title: Construct Tree from Preorder and Inorder
statement: Given preorder and inorder traversals of a binary tree, construct and return the tree. Print its level order traversal.
input_format:
First line contains N.
Second line contains N integers (preorder traversal).
Third line contains N integers (inorder traversal).
output_format: Print level order traversal of constructed tree, space-separated.
constraints:
1 <= N <= 3000
All values are unique.
-3000 <= Node.val <= 3000
